climbs.name: The Hueco Abides
climbs.fa: Claire Hart, Raj Saun, Elaina Schaffer, Mary Lane Poe, Josh Holcomb, Josh Gale, Justin Streit, and the Doodles

content.description: Despite some poor looking rock, the climbing is steep and fun and the big holds all live on dude! Begin on big opposing side pulls. A big move up begins the sequence up and right past big holds and the first bolt. Continue up and right to a second bolt and use a long sling here. From here it's straight up the hardest moves to the top of the formation and a two-bolt anchor.
content.protection: 3 bolts to a 2-bolt anchor with quicklinks.
content.location: Right route on the formation. Currently the only route present.

content.description: Named for the family members that stumbled across this feature on one of many romps through Red Rocks. This is a northeast-facing mini wall that could host a couple routes. It will not likely be a destination on its own, but could be a good spot to spend the end of the day or to warm up for some of the harder routes in the area. The climbing is steep and enjoyable.
